statements: UPDATE iot_security_alerts SET is_processed = true WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE iot_security_alerts SET alert_message = 'Unauthorized access detected' WHERE device_id = 5;
UPDATE iot_security_alerts SET is_processed = TRUE, alert_message = 'Alert Processed' WHERE id = 100;
UPDATE iot_security_alerts SET alert_timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00', is_processed = FALSE WHERE device_id = 200;
UPDATE devices SET device_name='Printer' WHERE device_id=1;
UPDATE security_alerts SET alert_message='Unauthorized access detected' WHERE alert_id=3;
UPDATE devices SET device_status = 'Offline' WHERE device_id = 12345;
UPDATE security_alerts SET alert_message = 'Unauthorized Access Attempt' WHERE alert_id = 98765;
UPDATE device_data SET data = 'New data', timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE security_alerts SET alert_message = 'Alert message updated', alert_timestamp = '2022-09-16 08:45:00', alert_type = 'High' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE device_data SET data = 'New data value', timestamp = NOW() WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE security_logs SET log_level = 'ERROR', log_message = 'Unauthorized access detected', log_timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE device_id = 3;
UPDATE device_data SET data = '{"status": "active", "temperature": 25}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE security_teams SET team_email = 'security@example.com' WHERE team_name = 'Security Team';
UPDATE device_data SET data = '{"temperature": 25, "humidity": 60}' WHERE device_id = 12345;
UPDATE triggers SET trigger_description = 'This trigger monitors device data changes' WHERE trigger_name = 'DataChange';
UPDATE IoT_devices SET device_name = 'Smart Thermostat' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE Activity_logs SET activity_type = 'Temperature Change' WHERE log_id = 3;
UPDATE IoT_devices SET device_name = 'New Device Name' WHERE device_id = 1
UPDATE Team_assignments SET team_id = 2 WHERE device_id = 5
